net.javacoding.jspider.core.rule
Interface Ruleset

All Known Implementing Classes:
RuleSetImpl
public interface Ruleset

Interface of a RuleSet, a set of Rules that will be applied as a group on URLs. $Id: Ruleset.java,v 1.8 2003/04/03 16:24:53 vanrogu Exp $

Author:
Günther Van Roey

Field Summary
static int RULESET_GENERAL
          A general ruleset applied to all urls in the system.
static int RULESET_SITE
          A site-specific ruleset, only applied to urls of that site.
 
Method Summary
 void addRule(Rule rule)
          Adds a rule to the ruleset.
 Decision applyRules(SpiderContext context, Site currentSite, java.net.URL url)
          Applies the ruleset to the given URL.
 int getType()
          Returns the type of the ruleset - GENERAL or SITE.

Method Detail

applyRules

public Decision applyRules(SpiderContext context,
                           Site currentSite,
                           java.net.URL url)
Applies the ruleset to the given URL.

Parameters:
context - context we're spidering under
url - the url to decide on
currentSite - the site currently being spidered
Returns:
Decision object expressing the ruleset's decision about the given url in the given context.

addRule

public void addRule(Rule rule)
Adds a rule to the ruleset.

Parameters:
rule - rule to be added

getType

public int getType()
Returns the type of the ruleset - GENERAL or SITE.

Returns:
type of the ruleset
